entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 26 at 12:13PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Increased Flows on the Green River Below Flaming Gorge Reservoir Due to Releases... Releases from Flaming Gorge Reservoir have reached to around 8600 cfs by this morning, May 26 and is scheduled to last for 7 days before starting to ramp down. Water levels below the reservoir will around bankfull.
